title.rendered: “Relentless IDF Forces Takedown Terrorist Cells Across Gaza: An In-Depth Look at the Ongoing Operation”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF forces continue to fight across the Gaza Strip; a terrorist cell that fired at the forces was eliminated.

Forces of the 98th Division continue to fight in the heart of Jabalia. The combat teams of the Paratrooper Brigade and the 460th Brigade continue to operate in the area and have eliminated several terrorists in the last day. The combat team of the 7th Brigade directed an aircraft of the Air Forces which attacked and eliminated a terrorist cell that fired at the forces.

The forces of the 162nd Division continue to fight in Rafah. The Givati Brigade forces identified a terrorist who was firing mortar bombs at the forces, there were no casualties. The forces directed an aircraft which attacked and eliminated the terrorist. The combat team of the 401st Brigade eliminated several terrorists, in joint closures with the Air Forces and also found rockets and combat equipment in the area.

The forces of the 99th Division continue to operate in the center of the Strip. The combat team of the 679th Brigade identified a terrorist cell moving towards the forces, in a rapid closure an aircraft of the Air Forces attacked and eliminated the terrorists.

Over the last day, aircraft and fighter jets of the Air Forces attacked and destroyed about 70 terror targets across the Strip. Among the targets attacked were military buildings, weapons sites and warehouses, missile launchers, observation posts, terrorist cells, and other military infrastructures.

Attached is footage of IDF forces’ activity in the Strip: https://bit.ly/3QVHwAZ

Attached is documentation of IDF attacks in the Strip: https://bit.ly/3K8ghzg

Attached are photos from the activity of the IDF forces in the Strip:
